BANNERS.title: Discover the Himalayas
BANNERS.subtitle: Experience the adventure of a lifetime

BANNERS.title: Road Trips
BANNERS.subtitle: Drive through the worlds highest passes

itinerary.title: Shimla ➝ Chitkul
itinerary.details: Scenic drive via Rampur & Sangla Valley. Visit Rakcham & Baspa River. Overnight stay at Chitkul.

itinerary.title: Chitkul ➝ Kalpa
itinerary.details: Drive through Sangla Valley. Visit Kalpa village & Kinnaur Kailash views. Overnight stay at Kalpa.

itinerary.title: Kalpa ➝ Tabo
itinerary.details: En-route Khab Sangam, Nako Lake & Geyu Mummy. Visit Tabo Monastery. Overnight stay at Tabo.

itinerary.title: Tabo ➝ Kaza
itinerary.details: Visit Dhankar Monastery & Lake. Reach Kaza, the heart of Spiti. Overnight stay at Kaza.

itinerary.title: Kaza Local
itinerary.details: Visit Key Monastery, Kibber, Langza, Hikkim, and Komic. Overnight stay at Kaza.

itinerary.title: Kaza ➝ Losar
itinerary.details: Scenic drive through cold desert landscapes. Relax and acclimatize. Overnight stay at Losar.

itinerary.title: Losar ➝ Manali
itinerary.details: Cross Kunzum Pass. Drive via Chandratal route (weather permitting). Drop at Manali.

itinerary.title: Shimla ➝ Sarahan
itinerary.details: Visit Bhimakali Temple. Overnight stay: Sarahan.

itinerary.title: Sarahan ➝ Chitkul
itinerary.details: Visit Last Indian Village – Chitkul, Baspa River. Overnight stay: Chitkul.

itinerary.title: Chitkul ➝ Kalpa
itinerary.details: Visit Suicide Point, Apple Orchards. Overnight stay: Kalpa.

itinerary.title: Kalpa Local
itinerary.details: Visit Kinnaur Kailash View Point, Kalpa Monastery. Overnight stay: Kalpa.

itinerary.title: Kalpa ➝ Shimla
itinerary.details: Return via Reckong Peo. Tour ends.

itinerary.title: Chandigarh ➝ Shimla
itinerary.details: Pickup from Chandigarh. Drive to Shimla (4 hrs). Check-in and evening walk at Mall Road & Ridge. Overnight stay at Shimla.

itinerary.title: Shimla & Kufri Sightseeing
itinerary.details: Visit Kufri, Green Valley, and Jakhu Temple. Evening free for leisure. Overnight stay at Shimla.

itinerary.title: Shimla ➝ Manali
itinerary.details: Scenic drive to Manali (7-8 hrs). En-route visit Pandoh Dam and Hanogi Mata Temple. River Rafting in Kullu. Overnight stay at Manali.

itinerary.title: Manali Local & Solang Valley
itinerary.details: Visit Hadimba Temple, Vashisht Baths. Drive to Solang Valley and Atal Tunnel. Overnight stay at Manali.

itinerary.title: Manali ➝ Chandigarh Drop
itinerary.details: Morning drive back to Chandigarh (8 hrs). Drop at Railway Station/Airport. Tour ends.
